pages.text: In addition to the $(l:basics/pyre)Pyre$() and the required ingredients, some rituals require standing stones.$(br2)These two- or three- high blocks of $(resources/runestone)runestone$() capped with $(resources/runestone#chiseled)chiseled runestone$() are detailed in the ritual entry.$(br2)$(warning) Placement of these can vary from what is documented, but the lowest stone $(bold)must$() be on the same level as the Pyre.

Indeed, not all rituals require standing stones, but some rituals may require other objects (such as offering plates or trees).$(br2)All rituals with external requirements will show $(standing_stones) along with a link to a display of one potential arrangement of them.$(br2)In addition, all displays can be visualised in-world by clicking on the eye in the bottom-left corner.
